requirement_tested: Stock search functionality by code or name
user_persona: A financial analyst who wants to quickly find information about a specific stock.
user_goal: To search for a stock using its name or symbol and navigate to its summary page.

narrative_steps.title: Focusing the Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Sarah lands on the homepage and sees the centered search bar. She clicks inside it to begin her search.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar is focused, allowing text input, and the placeholder 'Enter stock code or name' is visible.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Name
narrative_steps.description: Sarah types 'Apple Inc.' into the search bar to look up the company's stock.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Apple Inc.' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The typed text appears in the input field with navy text on a white background.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Search Query
narrative_steps.description: After typing the name, Sarah presses Enter to submit her query.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dropdown list of matching stocks appears below the search bar, retrieved via the real-time stock data API.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Result
narrative_steps.description: Sarah hovers over the first result, 'AAPL - Apple Inc.', and clicks it to proceed.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the first result, then click it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar is populated with 'AAPL', and the page navigates to the stock summary page for Apple.

user_persona: A portfolio manager reviewing a potential investment.
user_goal: To view a concise summary of key stock metrics and understand what they mean.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing the Summary Card
narrative_steps.description: Michael lands on the stock summary page for Tesla and scans the card displaying key metrics.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A clean card with a white background and navy borders shows Tesla's name, symbol, price, change, P/E ratio, and other metrics.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Metric Details
narrative_steps.description: Curious about the P/E ratio, Michael clicks on it to understand its significance.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears explaining that the P/E ratio measures a company's current share price relative to its per-share earnings.

user_persona: An investor preparing for a client meeting.
user_goal: To generate a custom report focusing only on market trends and financial data.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Report Sections
narrative_steps.description: Jenny navigates to the report generator page and selects 'Market Trends Analysis' and 'Historical Financial Data' from the checklist.
narrative_steps.action: Click checkboxes for 'Market Trends Analysis' and 'Historical Financial Data'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both checkboxes are checked, indicating these sections will be included in the report.

narrative_steps.title: Generating the Report
narrative_steps.description: Jenny clicks the 'Generate Report' button to compile her custom report.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal overlay appears with a loading spinner, and the report is processed by the backend engine.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Confirmation
narrative_steps.description: Once processing completes, Jenny sees a success banner with a download link.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for the process to complete.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The loading spinner is replaced by a success banner with a link to view or download the generated report.

user_persona: A researcher who prefers working with Markdown files.
user_goal: To generate a report in Markdown format for easy documentation.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Format Dropdown
narrative_steps.description: David scrolls down to the format selector and clicks the dropdown to see available options.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of export formats including PDF, Word Document, Plain Text, and Markdown appears.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Markdown
narrative_steps.description: David selects 'Markdown (.md)' from the dropdown as his preferred format.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Markdown (.md)' from the dropdown list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dropdown closes, and 'Markdown (.md)' is now selected as the output format.

user_persona: A junior analyst tasked with compiling a partial report.
user_goal: To exclude analyst opinions and focus only on basic and financial data.

narrative_steps.title: Unchecking Unwanted Sections
narrative_steps.description: Emma deselects 'Analyst Opinions' since it's not required for this report.
narrative_steps.action: Click the checkbox next to 'Analyst Opinions' to uncheck it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The checkbox is unchecked, confirming that the section will be excluded from the report.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Selections
narrative_steps.description: Emma verifies that only 'Basic Info', 'Market Trends', and 'Financial Data' are selected.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only the desired sections remain checked, aligning with her reporting scope.

user_persona: A new investor learning about a company.
user_goal: To understand fundamental details like headquarters and CEO of a company.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Basic Info Section
narrative_steps.description: Robert scrolls to the basic information section on the stock page.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the basic information panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A two-column layout appears with a company logo placeholder on the left and key facts listed on the right.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Key Facts
narrative_steps.description: He hovers over the 'CEO' field to get more context about the leadership.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears showing additional context about the current CEO's role and tenure.

user_goal: To analyze recent stock movements compared to the S&P 500.

narrative_steps.title: Adjusting Time Range
narrative_steps.description: Sophia clicks the '1M' button to view the stock's performance over the past month.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart updates to show price movements over the last month.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Benchmark Overlay
narrative_steps.description: She selects 'S&P 500' from the benchmark options to compare performance.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The S&P 500 trendline overlays on the existing chart, allowing visual comparison.

user_persona: A financial auditor verifying reported earnings.
user_goal: To review quarterly financial data and export it for offline analysis.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Quarterly Data
narrative_steps.description: Thomas switches the view to 'Quarterly View' to see detailed financial breakdowns.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The table updates to show quarterly financial data including revenue, EPS, and net income.

narrative_steps.title: Exporting Raw Data
narrative_steps.description: He clicks the export link to download the data for further scrutiny.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Download raw data as CSV file' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A CSV file containing the visible financial data is downloaded to his computer.

user_persona: A busy executive needing a quick report.
user_goal: To generate and download a comprehensive report without delays.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Generation
narrative_steps.description: Patricia selects all sections and clicks 'Generate Report' to compile everything.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal with a loading spinner appears, indicating the report is being processed asynchronously.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading the Final Report
narrative_steps.description: Once the success banner appears, Patricia clicks the download link.
narrative_steps.action: Click the download link in the success banner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The fully compiled report is downloaded in the selected format without page reloads.

requirement_tested: White background with navy component color scheme
user_persona: A UX reviewer checking brand consistency.
user_goal: To verify that all UI components follow the specified color palette.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Page Background
narrative_steps.description: James examines the homepage to confirm the overall design uses a white background.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The entire page background is consistently white as defined in the global stylesheet.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Component Colors
narrative_steps.description: He inspects buttons and headers to ensure they use the navy accent color.
narrative_steps.action: Look at interactive elements like buttons and headings.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive controls and headings are styled with the navy color (#000080).

requirement_tested: User input interface for stock queries
user_persona: A casual user exploring stock options.
user_goal: To enter a partial stock name and submit the query successfully.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Partial Query
narrative_steps.description: Lisa begins typing 'Micro' into the input field, hoping to find Microsoft.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The text 'Micro' appears in the input field with navy borders and placeholder text still visible.

narrative_steps.title: Activating Submit Button
narrative_steps.description: As she types, the previously disabled submit button becomes active.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'Submit Query' button changes to an enabled state, ready for interaction.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Query
narrative_steps.description: Lisa clicks the now-enabled submit button to send her query.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The query is forwarded to the backend for processing, triggering a search action.

user_persona: A content editor proofreading a draft report.
user_goal: To preview changes before finalizing the report.

narrative_steps.title: Making Edits
narrative_steps.description: Nina adjusts the selected sections and formatting options for the report.
narrative_steps.action: Modify content selections and format preferences.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Changes are registered in the configuration panel awaiting preview update.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Preview
narrative_steps.description: She clicks the 'Refresh Preview' button to see how her edits affect the layout.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The iframe preview pane reloads, reflecting the updated report draft.

user_persona: A compliance officer needing reports in multiple formats.
user_goal: To download the same report in both PDF and DOCX formats.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading as PDF
narrative_steps.description: Marcus clicks the PDF icon to save the report in portable document format.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A browser prompt initiates the download of the report as a PDF file.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading as DOCX
narrative_steps.description: He then clicks the DOCX icon to get a version compatible with word processors.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Another download prompt starts, saving the report as a .docx file.

user_persona: A day trader monitoring live price movements.
user_goal: To observe real-time updates of a stock's price throughout the trading session.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Live Updates
narrative_steps.description: Carlos watches the stock price on the summary page, noting it refreshes every few seconds.
narrative_steps.action: Stay on the stock summary page for a minute.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The displayed price updates automatically based on real-time data fetched from external APIs.

narrative_steps.title: Adjusting Update Frequency
narrative_steps.description: He navigates to settings and increases the refresh rate for faster updates.
narrative_steps.action: Change the auto-update interval setting to 5 seconds.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page now fetches and displays new stock data every 5 seconds.

user_persona: A mobile user accessing the platform on a tablet.
user_goal: To easily navigate between sections using the responsive menu bar.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: Elena taps the menu bar at the top of the screen to explore other sections.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Menu items like 'Home', 'Search Stocks', 'My Reports', and 'Settings' are clearly visible and evenly spaced.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to My Reports
narrative_steps.description: She clicks on 'My Reports' to view previously generated documents.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page smoothly transitions to the My Reports section, adapting layout to fit the tablet screen.
